name: Rogue Spore (Prototype1)
description:
Rogue Spore is a dungeon crawler inspired by roguelikes. You get to decide how to progress forward using various methods by collecting gold and materials to craft new abilities, new passives, and potions. (Only contains first basic boss, additions will be added over time). 

It is still in the making. 

To get WSAD controls go to options and keyboard config. There should be an option on the middle-bottom to switch to WSAD controls. Save the changes and you are good to go. 

Prototype1 is made in RPG Maker MV
